mapper.update: update dr_claims_loan set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
update dr_claims_loan set showStatus = 0 where id = #{id}
update dr_claims_loan set showStatus = 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select DISTINCT cityCode,city from js_fuiou_area ORDER BY cityCode
select DISTINCT areaCode,area from js_fuiou_area where cityCode=#{cityCode}

select dc.name, dc.no, dc.status, dc.loanUse, dc.loanAmount, dc.loanDeadline, dc.receiveInterest, dc.loanDeadline, dc.repayType, dc.dateType, dc.repayDeadline, dc.startDate, dc.endDate, dc.loanName, dc.bankName, dc.bankNo, dc.advisoryRate, dc.serviceRate, dc.defaultersRate, dc.overdueRate, dc.overduePenaltyRate, dc.riskRate from dr_claims_loan dc LEFT JOIN dr_subject_info ds on ds.lid=dc.id LEFT JOIN dr_product_info dp on dp.sid=ds.id where dp.id = #{id}
